title: Miami Undercover
overview: Jeff Thompson was a private investigator, who along with his sidekick Rocky, were hired by Miami hotel owners to fight crime in the city. Miami Undercover is an American crime drama series that aired in broadcast syndication from January to October 1961 for a total of 38 episodes. The series stars Lee Bowman as Jeff Thompson posing as a sophisticated man about town and former Boxer Rocky Graziano as his assistant Rocky.
